name: Time Rift (ss0198)
description:
At some time in the far far future scientists of the Ragisaki Group(TM) found one of the fabled lost time pieces and are trying to change the past as well as gauge control over the whole universe!

However, they didn’t have any idea about their opposition: Hagasaki Holding(TM)!

Through secret channels word of Ragisaki Group’s shrewd plans got out and made their way towards their competitors who sent their best person for the job of stopping their plans: YOU!

By sabotaging the super computer - which is also used to stabilising the time piece - stationed on a satellite of Ragisaki Group you manage to find yourself an avenue into the location of the relic.

Unfortunately, the now unstable time piece is getting out of control and is allowing people nearby to manipulate time.

Will you be able to fix the time piece and put an end to the unstable space time continuum filled with seemingly infinite jumps in time?

Keybinds:

Shift -> Sprint

C -> Crouch

Shift + C -> Slide

V -> Vault/Climb

Space -> Jump
